body: First off, @kappa korps v2, why don't you learn proper English. It's you're(you are), not your. Your is possessive, like, that's your bottle. And the comment section should be for comments on the works here, not on the folks who read it. Get a freaking life, asshole. Or better yet, go back to school and learn how to read and write proper English.
Or anyone else who is masturbating to this, for that matter.
Who said the uploader is in denial?
im gonna find the faggot who is spamming the front page with little girls, to whoever is mastrubating to this, your in denial, pedophile.,
